name: GT Legends：Last Battle
description:
Join the universe adventure! Travel across different universes and make new friends, and challenge the strongest warriors from each world!

Universe Travel
Enjoy the thrilling story, powerful allies, bountiful rewards and have fun with the progression systems

Epic Battles
Fight in the delicately designed maps and wield well-polished moves to defeat your opponents! The fancy skill special effects and combat mechanisms will widen your eyes.

Collect Warriors
Over 100 warriors await you. Forge your own strategy and play style!

Go after your dream!
